snippet: Lt. Gov. Bill Bolling, who seemed to be positioning himself as a moderate alternative to the Republican nominee, Kenneth T. Cuccinelli II, said he would not run as an independent.
abstract: Lt. Gov. Bill Bolling, who seemed to be positioning himself as a moderate alternative to the Republican nominee, Kenneth T. Cuccinelli II, said he would not run as an independent.

headline.main: Bolling Declines Independent Bid for Virginia Governor
